scripts.migrate: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=local node build/db/migrate.js
scripts.migrate:dev: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev node build/db/migrate.js
scripts.migrate:prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node build/db/migrate.js
scripts.rollBack: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=local node build/db/rollback.js
scripts.rollBack:dev: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev node build/db/rollback.js
scripts.rollBack:prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node build/db/rollback.js
